db:article.db:para: assimp (Open Asset Import Library) is a portable open source library to import various well-known 3D model formats in a uniform manner.
Used for importing assets for use with Qt 3D
The sources can be found in qt3d/src/3rdparty/assimp.
db:article.db:programlisting:
